thread.title: Perfect finish for Austin Prep golf
thread.title_full: Perfect finish for Austin Prep golf | Boston Herald

author: Herald Staff
title: Perfect finish for Austin Prep golf
text:
Nick Hampoian and Drew Gerety helped lead Austin Prep to the Catholic Central League title and the first undefeated golf season in school history.
Form held true at the CCL Individual Championship yesterday at the Gannon Municipal Course in Lynn as Hampoian earned medalist honors by shooting a 73. Gerety tied for second with Liam Gleason (Lowell Catholic) and Chris Russell (Bishop Fenwick), all of whom carded a 76.
“We’re very excited for Nick and Drew, they’ve been automatic all season long,” said Austin Prep coach Paul Mayo. “We’ve won the league before a few times, but this is the first year we went undefeated. It was great to see them shoot so well here.”
In addition to Hampoian and Gerety, Mike Strazzere shot a 78 and Alex Maffeo fired a 79 to give the Cougars four golfers in the top 12.
